Hi there, 

I am using a CTRNN version of rtNEAT, which is an upgraded vers=
ion of 
Tyler Streeter's leakyNEAT code, combined with the rtNEAT release. =


The problem is that there is no pattern generation at all. I am not 
sure=
 what is the problem. The neurons use the standard sigmoid 
activation func=
tion, that outputs in the range of (0 .. 1). The 
networks are fully interc=
onnected with 10 neurons. They always 
stabilize at one state and the neuro=
ns don't change activation as time 
progresses further. Interesting, when I=
 switch the activation fucntion 
to tanh(), they do generate patterns, like=
 walking gaits and so on, but 
why this does not happen when the function i=
s 1/1+exp(-x)?
